net.openhft.chronicle.core.io

Class UnsafeText

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.UnsafeText

  • public final class UnsafeText
extends Object
    These are fast, unsafe ways to render text. NOTE: The caller has to ensure there is always plenty of memory to perform this operation.
